title: Scandinavian Countries & Aurora Borealis
description: 10 nights lodging w/breakfast. Bus tour with guide. Transfers in/out. Mini cruise with overnight on board from Copenhagen to Oslo. Airfare Oslo-Tromsö-Stockholm. Fast train from Oslo to Stockholm.

title: Natal
description: From Mendoza with carry on. 9 nights Aquaria Hotel. Breakfast

title: San Andrés
description: Discover the unique beauty of San Andrés with our exciting 7-night tour package. Departing on November 7, 2024 from Mendoza with Copa Airlines, you will embark on an unforgettable experience in this Caribbean paradise. During your stay, you will be hosted at the exclusive Ataraxy Boutique Hotel, where each day will begin with a delicious included breakfast to prepare you for your adventures on the island. In addition, we offer traveler assistance to guarantee your peace of mind throughout the trip. Dive into the crystal clear waters, explore the vibrant coral reefs and relax on the white sand beaches while you delight in the stunning views and warm hospitality of San Andrés. Get ready to live an unforgettable experience in this paradise destination in the Caribbean!

title: Golden Temple and Maldives
description: Airfare flying with Emirates BUE/DEL/MLE/BUE in economy class. Visiting Delhi, Amritsar, Agra, Jaipur, Udaipur, Varanasi, Mumbai, and Maldives. Accommodation in superior 4-star hotels with breakfasts, 2 lunches, and All Inclusive in Maldives. Transfers with Spanish-speaking guide and internal air tickets.

title: Cruise through Uruguay
description: Embark on a unique adventure with the Costa Favolosa Cruise through Uruguay! Enjoy a 3 or 4-night mini cruise with departures available on December 6, 10, 13, and 17. With the purchase of your cruise, we give you the drinks so you can fully enjoy your experience! Explore the wonders of Uruguay from the comfort and luxury of the Costa Favolosa. With rates subject to availability at the time of confirming the reservation, secure your spot on this exciting journey. Additionally, please note that additional taxes, approximately 123 USD, will apply to ensure a worry-free experience. Don't miss the opportunity to discover the beauty of Uruguay as you sail along its coasts. Book now and get ready for an unforgettable experience aboard the Costa Favolosa Cruise!

title: Cruise through Brazil
description: Embark on an exciting adventure with the Costa Favolosa Cruise through Brazil! Enjoy a mini cruise with departures available on January 5 and 13, as well as on January 21 and 29, February 6 and 22, and March 2, 10, and 18. With the purchase of your cruise, we give you the drinks so you can fully enjoy your experience! Explore the wonders of Brazil from the comfort and luxury of the Costa Favolosa. With rates subject to availability at the time of confirming the reservation, secure your spot on this exciting journey. Additionally, please note that additional taxes, approximately 306 USD, will apply to ensure a worry-free experience. Don't miss the opportunity to discover the beauty of Brazil as you sail along its spectacular coasts. Book now and get ready to live unforgettable moments aboard the Costa Favolosa Cruise!

title: Buzios
description: Air from Mendoza with Carryon. Transfers in/out. Hotel subject to availability. Breakfast

title: Punta Cana Summer Special
description: Get ready for an unforgettable summer in Punta Cana with our special package! Departure on February 12 from Mendoza with flights including carry-on luggage. Enjoy 7 nights at the luxurious Occidental Caribe Resort, where you can relax and enjoy all the amenities with an all-inclusive plan. Additionally, we offer arrival and departure transfers to ensure your trip is completely worry-free. Don't miss the chance to enjoy the paradisiacal beaches of Punta Cana this summer. Book now and get ready for a dream vacation!

title: Aruba
description: Get ready for an unforgettable getaway to Aruba with our special offer! Departure on October 22 from Mendoza with convenient flights from Copa Airlines. Enjoy 8 nights of accommodation at the charming Posada The Coconut Inn, where warm hospitality and a delicious breakfast await you every morning. Additionally, we offer arrival and departure transfers to ensure your trip is completely worry-free. Immerse yourself in the crystal-clear waters of the Caribbean, relax on the white sandy beaches, and explore the charms of this beautiful island. Book now and get ready for an unforgettable experience in Aruba!

title: Aruba
description: Get ready for an exciting adventure in Aruba with our special offer! Departure on October 22 from Mendoza with convenient flights from Copa Airlines. Enjoy 8 nights of accommodation at the charming Posada Sandra Tours, where a cozy and authentic experience awaits you. Additionally, we offer arrival and departure transfers to ensure your trip is completely worry-free. Immerse yourself in the crystal-clear waters, explore the vibrant local culture, and relax on the white sandy beaches of this beautiful Caribbean island. Book now and prepare to create unforgettable memories in Aruba!

title: Universal
description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure with our Universal package from November 24, 2024. Enjoy 13 days of travel, with flights from Buenos Aires and luggage included. You will stay at the Universal Explorer Hotel and have 14 days of access to the 3 parks with the Universal Explorer pass. Prices shown are per person based on double occupancy. Don't miss this opportunity to experience the magic of Universal at its best!

title: Orlando with Christmas Spirit
description: Immerse yourself in the Christmas spirit with our 'Orlando with Christmas Spirit' package. From December 10 to 18, enjoy 6 nights in Orlando and 2 nights in Miami. You'll have a car for 8 days to explore at your own pace. It includes 4 days of Disney park with the Hopper Plan and 2 days of Universal park with Park to Park access. Family Plan. Experience a magical and fun-filled Christmas with your family!
